name: Double Click Dictionary Look-up
author: Ivan Tse

sections.description:
Double click on the screen to highlight a word. This creates a qTip next to the word where when clicked, a pop-up will appear with the m-w.com’s definition on the word.

Please let me know of any changes you would like to see =). Post here or post your comment at the plugin website
sections.installation:
1. Download and upload the folder dbl-click-dictionary-look-up to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq: None as of yet. Please post on the website for questions!
sections.changelog:
0.2

Added IE fix

0.1

  • Changes to readme.txt
  • Plugin initial release

short_description: Subscribers can easily look up a word's definition by double clicking on a word and clicking the qtip that appears.
